ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Sony sucks!
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah. I m going to talk to them when their CS opens today. I had a problem with my mother s account and them saying she didn t have the new expansion
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah. I'm going to talk to them when their CS opens today. I had a problem with my mother's account and them saying she didn't have the new expansion registered. I had to email them and complain. They took care of it fairly quickly. Considering they might lose 4 accounts from me, they better do something when I contact them.
luv,
-Su


======= At 2005-04-25, 22:46:00 you wrote: =======

>If they still owe you time or $$$ then contact them and sort it out. Don't take a disabled acc. as an answer!
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Su
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Monday, April 25, 2005 10:54 PM
> Subject: [EverQuest] Sony sucks!
>
>
> I may be through with EQ now. I went to login to check my email and apparently for no reason my account was shut off. I have no idea why. Well, I have an idea and it might be the same fuck up as with my brother's account previously. So, I have to decide whether or not I want to bother renewing because they will probably charge me a higher price. I had a 3 year subscription dammit. It just pisses me off that they pulled this with me. I'm thinking of writing them an angry letter of complaint. I should wait til I'm less angry though.
> ARG. Just ARG!!!
> luv,
> -Su
>





--
